entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to publish views of a Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web project #36583
  • [HotReload][BlazorWASM]: Adding an attribute to InputSelect results in a rude edit #36582
  • `dotnet workload install wasm-tools` Fails #36581
  • `dotnet watch` with `aot` leads to unexpected behavior #36579
  • Missing .msg extension in FileExtensionContentTypeProvider #36576
  • Allow SignalR to work in AWS serverless environment #36575
  • InputFile component has two onchange event handlers #36573
  • Blazor Server .NET 6 new project template issues #36572
  • Components that mirror HTML elements cause invalid errors #36569
    17.0-Preview5
  • Components that mirror HTML elements don't auto-close correctly. #36568
    17.0-Preview5
  • Startup improvement: plaintext #36567
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper #36566
  • MVC actions returning Problem Details should return the standard media type for Problem Details responses #36560
    6.0-rc2
  • Minimal APIs should return the standard media type for Problem Details responses #36557
    6.0-rc2
  • CSS error does not get remapped properly #36556
    17.0-Preview5
  • ngen O# assemblies #36554
    17.0-Preview5
  • Rename "DelegateEndpoint" types #36553
    6.0-rc2
  • Building a 5.0 app with 6.0 SDK in VS 2019 causes analyzers to fail to load #36552
  • VS2022 Razor editor incorrect completion with bind-Val #36550
  • W3C Logger monthly / custom naming #36544
    .NET 7 Planning
  • UseHttpsRedirection breaks cors #36542
  • NET 6 RC1 Blazor Wasm SignalR WebSockets authentication fails. #36541
  • 404 with `_content/Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CustomElements/BlazorCustomElements.js` #36539
    6.0.0
  • app.UseWebAssemblyDebugging() returns Method not found after update from 6.0 preview 7 to 6.0 RC 1 #36538
  • Avoid invocation of subsequent AuthorizationHandlers for a single Requirement #36536
  • Blazor Server - Cannot find the fallback endpoint specified by route values: { page: /_Host, area: } exception with RC1 #36535
  • Release notes for packages such as Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.AzureAppServices #36532
  • Startup regression: connectionclosehttps #36531
  • Route constraints don't produce appropriate information in OpenAPI schema #36525
  • role based routing support #36524
  • Support nullable structs with TryParse in RequestDelegateFactory #36523

Closed

  • `dotnet run -p:Configuration=Release` looks for assets in `bin/Debug` #36521
    6.0-rc2
  • Semantic tokens experience improvements aka "Project Palette" #33200
    17.0-Preview5
  • [Blazor .Net 6 RC1] PreRender: Has ComponentApplicationState been renamed/changed namespace? #36507
  • 🐞 The `WebApplicationBuilder.Configuration` add custom configuration provider was called more than once. #36452
    6.0-rc2
  • Re-enable Win7 tests once dotnet restore hangs are resolved #32683
  • error MSB3073 during build from command line #33771
  • Remove CS1705 workarounds #31075
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #36530
  • Ignore #36551
  • Hot reload error on rc1 on VS or dotnet watch #36533
  • .Net Core 6 RC1 Blazor HotReload stops working after specific HTML update #36528
  • Ensure WASM native asset support is merged for RC2 #36333
    6.0-rc2
  • Avoid duplicates in automatically generated endpoint names #36487
    6.0-rc2
  • X-Forwarded-For header parsing error and invalid fallback to reverse proxy IP #36537
  • Cannot inspect parameter attributes in API Explorer with Minimal Actions #36438
    6.0-rc2
  • Blazor RunAOTCompilation fails during BlazorWebAssembly.ComputeBlazorPublishAssets.Execute #35633
    6.0-rc2
  • [Flaky test] Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor.Tests.StaticWebAssetsIntegrationTest.Publish_WithBuildReferencesDisabled_CopiesStaticWebAssetsToDestinationFolder #30245
  • Blazor script security problems RC1 #36529
  • [Blazor-wasm] Continuation of: Lazy loading of application areas #5465 #36493
  • Startup improvement: json #36445
  • Cannot find the fallback endpoint specified by route values: { page: /_Host, area: }. #36453
    6.0-rc2
  • Repeatable crash with specific Razor text edit #27667
    17.0-Preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Add support for BindAsync without ParameterInfo #36580
  • [release/6.0] Rename and consolidate "DelegateEndpoint" types #36578
    area-runtime
  • Stabilize versions for 6.0.0 RTM #36571
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • [main] Update SiteExtension versions #36565
    area-infrastructure
  • Revert "[release/5.0] Disable OSX10.14 Helix jobs for now" #36564
    area-infrastructure, 5.1.12
  • Set bootstrap5 for default static assets #36561
    area-identity
  • [release/5.0] Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #36559
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Update SiteExtension versions #36558
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixup OpenAPI displayed param type when using TryParse #36555
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Avoid using TargetFramework in build targets #36545
    area-mvc
  • Fixup OpenAPI displayed param type when using TryParse #36526
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Make DelegateEndpointConventionBuilder constructors public (#36492) #36549
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Expose ParameterInfo for Minimal Actions API Explorer (#36439) #36547
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Avoid building the configuration sources twice #36574
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Revert "[release/6.0] Disable OSX10.14 Helix jobs for now" #36562
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Revert setting endpoint name automatically (#36518) #36548
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Avoid building the configuration sources twice #36570
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #36516
    area-infrastructure
  • Revert "Disable OSX10.14 Helix jobs for now" #36563
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix up solution file #36383
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Check for duplicate endpoint names on startup #36353
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Expose ParameterInfo for Minimal Actions API Explorer #36439
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Avoid using TargetFramework in build targets #36512
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/5.0] Test in manual internal builds #36484
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #36517
    3.1.20
  • Don't ignore XML doc warnings for Polly #36485
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine failing test #36473
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Stop using unencrypted git protocol in build.gradle #36476
    area-signalr, 6.0-rc2
  • Revert setting endpoint name automatically #36518
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2

Updated

  • Add support for BindAsync without ParameterInfo #36505
    area-web-frameworks
  • Use minimal APIs for F# project templates #35833
    area-mvc
  • Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #36100
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `796e436` to `a64c11d` #36482
    area-infrastructure
  • Dougbu/check.solution.filters #36449
    area-infrastructure
  • PR benchmarks #36309
    area-perf
  • [main] [release/6.0] Initial Bootstrap v4 SxS support #36397
    area-identity
  • Update build.gradle #36478
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 5.0.x
